Title: The vibe of looking back at normal Germans and wondering how they could become Nazis will be how peo...
Author: Jake Koenig
Summary: The vibe of looking back at normal Germans and wondering how they could become Nazis will be how people in 2100 will see us and our inability to see the singularity coming. What do you mean they didn't understand where things where headed after GPT-2?! (minus the moral horror)
